intro: Acinodendron epiphyticum, commonly known as the epiphytic acinodendron, is a rare tropical plant belonging to the family Rubiaceae. It is an epiphyte, meaning it grows on the surface of other plants without deriving nutrients from them. The plant typically thrives in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests. Its leaves are usually small,革质 (leathery), and arranged in a rosette pattern. It produces small, white or pale yellow flowers that are often clustered in inflorescences.
